mapper.insert: insert into dtb_campaign (title, content, writer) values (#{title}, #{content}, #{writer})
mapper.select: select bno, title, content, writer, regdate, viewcnt from dtb_campaign where bno=#{bno}
mapper.update: update dtb_campaign set title = #{title}, content = #{content} where bno = #{bno}
mapper.select: select bno, title, content, writer, regdate, viewcnt from dtb_campaign where bno > 0 order by bno desc, regdate desc
select bno, title, content, writer, regdate, viewcnt from dtb_campaign where bno > 0 order by bno desc, regdate desc limit #{page}, 10
select bno, title, content, writer, regdate, viewcnt from dtb_campaign where bno > 0 order by bno desc, regdate desc limit #{pageStart}, #{perPageNum}
